verbs.description: jcps fires teacher for [V: using] [ARG1: sick leave] [ARGM-TMP: while on cruise jcps] has fired a teacher for using sick time while she went on a cruise in october the district learned about the cruise through posts the teacher made on her facebook page jennifer tyra john f kennedy elementary school state law louisville kentucky leave jefferson county public schools kentucky facebook superintendent donna hargens teacher wdrb news
